pkgmetadata.longdescription: Higher-Order Item Response Theory // Higher-order latent trait theory (item response theory). We implement the generalized partial credit model with a second-order latent trait structure. Latent regression can be done on the second-order latent trait. For a pre-print of the methods, see, "Latent Regression in Higher-Order Item Response Theory with the R Package hlt" https://mkleinsa.github.io/doc/hlt_proof_draft_brmic.pdf.
